abilities.name: Coordinated Leadership
abilities.rule: At the end of your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Failure Is Not an Option
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

abilities.name: Hover Drone
abilities.rule: The bearer can **FLY** and has a Move characteristic of 10".

abilities.name: Shield Drone
abilities.rule: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

abilities.name: Marker Drone
abilities.rule: The bearer’s unit has the **MARKERLIGHT** keyword and can act as an Observer unit for another unit even if it Advanced this turn.

abilities.name: Gun Drone
abilities.rule: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon:
